scenes.description: Hiodoshi Ao performs '青の朔日' (Ao no Sakujitsu).

subtitles.original: あなたの言葉だけは歌ってほしい
subtitles.english: I want you to sing only your words

subtitles.original: ならば私は戦える
subtitles.english: Then I can fight

subtitles.original: たとえこの耳が聞こえないとしても
subtitles.english: Even if these ears cannot hear

subtitles.original: 思い出せなくなった
subtitles.english: I can't remember anymore

subtitles.original: 虹を覚えてる空には
subtitles.english: In the sky that remembers the rainbow

subtitles.original: 再び叩く音が響くよ
subtitles.english: The sound of knocking echoes once again

subtitles.original: それでも歩いてると
subtitles.english: Even so, as I walk

subtitles.original: 掴もうとしてすり抜けた
subtitles.english: I tried to grab it, but it slipped away

subtitles.original: 言葉忘れない手のひら
subtitles.english: The words I won't forget, in my palm

subtitles.original: 指を蓋にして隠して
subtitles.english: Hiding it with my fingers as a lid

subtitles.original: 強さに変える魔法を
subtitles.english: The magic that turns it into strength

subtitles.original: あとどれだけ息をしたら
subtitles.english: After how many more breaths

subtitles.original: これで良かったと思える
subtitles.english: Can I think this was for the best

subtitles.original: 心がずっと砕けながら
subtitles.english: While my heart keeps breaking

subtitles.original: かけらの全部で動いてる
subtitles.english: It's moving with all its pieces

subtitles.original: これはきっと帰り道
subtitles.english: This must be the way back

subtitles.original: あの日と同じじゃなくていい
subtitles.english: It doesn't have to be the same as that day

subtitles.original: ただもう一度だけ会いたい
subtitles.english: I just want to meet you one more time

subtitles.original: 何も怖くない
subtitles.english: I'm not afraid of anything

subtitles.original: 泣かないで祈るのは
subtitles.english: What I'm praying for without crying

subtitles.original: 足跡の下の涙
subtitles.english: Are the tears under my footprints

subtitles.original: 迷いを乗せた爪先で
subtitles.english: With my toes carrying my doubts

subtitles.original: 進め 進め 魂ごと
subtitles.english: Move forward, move forward, with my whole soul

subtitles.original: 正しいかどうか何てことよりも
subtitles.english: More than whether it's right or not

subtitles.original: あなたのいる世界が笑ってほしい
subtitles.english: I want the world you're in to smile

subtitles.original: だから私は生きている
subtitles.english: That's why I'm alive

subtitles.original: 時計の針にも奪えない力
subtitles.english: A power that even the hands of a clock cannot take away

subtitles.original: 鳥になった宝物が
subtitles.english: The treasure that became a bird

subtitles.original: 落とす影まだ探してる
subtitles.english: Is still looking for the shadow it casts

subtitles.original: ああ もう一度だけ会いたい
subtitles.english: Ah, I want to meet you one more time

subtitles.original: 何も怖くない
subtitles.english: I'm not afraid of anything

subtitles.original: 命は理由に出会えた
subtitles.english: Life has found its reason

subtitles.original: 燃えて消える意味を知った
subtitles.english: I learned the meaning of burning and disappearing

subtitles.original: その日が視界を照らした
subtitles.english: That day illuminated my vision

subtitles.original: 青く 青く どこまでも
subtitles.english: Blue, blue, everywhere

subtitles.original: 明日がすべてを失っても
subtitles.english: Even if tomorrow loses everything

subtitles.original: 繋げた鼓動だけは歌ってほしい
subtitles.english: I want you to sing only the heartbeats we've connected

subtitles.original: だから私は生きている
subtitles.english: That's why I'm alive

subtitles.original: かけらの全部で
subtitles.english: With all the pieces

subtitles.original: 泣かないで祈るのは
subtitles.english: What I'm praying for without crying

subtitles.original: 足跡の下の涙
subtitles.english: Are the tears under my footprints

subtitles.original: 迷いを乗せた爪先で
subtitles.english: With my toes carrying my doubts

subtitles.original: 進め 進め 魂ごと
subtitles.english: Move forward, move forward, with my whole soul

subtitles.original: 間違いかどうか何てことよりも
subtitles.english: More than whether it's a mistake or not

subtitles.original: あなたのいる世界が続いてほしい
subtitles.english: I want the world you're in to continue

subtitles.original: ならば私は戦える
subtitles.english: Then I can fight

subtitles.original: たとえその時そばにいないとしても
subtitles.english: Even if I'm not by your side at that time

subtitles.original: この地球(ほし)全てが上の空
subtitles.english: This whole planet is absent-minded

subtitles.original: 半端な覚悟で来なよ坊や
subtitles.english: Don't come with half-hearted resolve, boy

subtitles.original: Be a beast 独り言のVivid yeah
subtitles.english: Be a beast, a vivid monologue yeah

subtitles.original: はめ外すなよ坊や
subtitles.english: Don't get carried away, boy

subtitles.original: なんでそんなに自信があるんですか?
subtitles.english: Why are you so confident?

subtitles.original: 己で掴んだ結果が当たり前じゃん
subtitles.english: The results I've grabbed for myself are only natural

subtitles.original: Be a beast 独り言の皮肉 yeah
subtitles.english: Be a beast, a cynical monologue yeah

subtitles.original: 鼻に付くかな坊や
subtitles.english: Does it get on your nerves, boy?

subtitles.original: お褒めを 栄養を
subtitles.english: Praise me, nourish me

subtitles.original: 目まわし出すときまるのもう一味をよこせ
subtitles.english: When things get dizzy and settled, give me another flavor

subtitles.original: Go way I'm a baby お前が言いたいどうしたいか提示
subtitles.english: Go way I'm a baby, show me what you want to say or do

subtitles.original: おかわりはいかがですか?
subtitles.english: Would you like seconds?

subtitles.original: 夢を越えろ そこから 上を向けよ
subtitles.english: Surpass your dreams, and look up from there

subtitles.original: リアルに上を 上をへ
subtitles.english: Realistically, higher and higher

subtitles.original: ヴォー ここまで来いよ
subtitles.english: Whoa, come this far

subtitles.original: Come on baby, come on baby
subtitles.english: Come on baby, come on baby

subtitles.original: Come on baby, come on baby
subtitles.english: Come on baby, come on baby
